Instruction: Pour in coconut milk and cook for an additional 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Cook and stir onion, curry powder, and dry mustard in the hot oil until onion is softened, about 5 minutes. Add tomatoes, garlic, garam masala, cumin, and salt; let simmer over medium-low heat until the tomatoes have broken down and the flavors are well combined, about 40 minutes.
